summary.value: I'll defeat evil and bring peace to the world!

system.description:
HERO

ALSO: Champion, Chosen One, Savior

  • What lit your desire to help those in need?

  • How far are you willing to go when helping others? Would you risk your life?

  • What makes you seek connections with people you meet? What is your strongest one?

  • Is there something that can break your will?

HERO FREE BENEFITS

  • Permanently increase your maximum Hit Points or Mind Points by 5 (your choice).

  • Gain the ability to equip martial melee weapons and martial shields.

HERO SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.MCrVhNlP4jbzdJi6]{A Hero's Purpose} (SL3)

Once per session, when you save an NPC or community from danger or complete a quest for them, you gain 【SL】 Fabula Points.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.4NcCRrGyuuOrgI8J]{It Was Destiny}

You may use an action and spend 1 Fabula Point to create a bond with 1 emotion tied to it, or add or change 1 emotion to a bond you have, or add or change 1 emotion to a bond another Player Character present in the scene has with you (with their permission).
Explain how destiny affected your relationships.

If you have the Ties That Bind skill, you may spend 20 Mind Points and immediately use it with no Fabula Point cost to invoke the bond you just created or altered with this skill.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.qg39quSjbKuvHLPo]{Power Of Friendship} (SL2)

You gain a number of extra bond slots equal to 【SL】 .
Additionally, once per session, If a Villain brings you to 0 Hit Points and you Surrender, you may immediately spend 2 Fabula Points to return to the Conflict with 【Number of Bond × 5】 Hit Points. Then, the Villain loses 1 Ultima Point.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.iIBms0agbwthfoEz]{Resolve} (SL5)

You may use an action and spend 1 Fabula Point to recover from all status effects and also recover 【SL × 5】Mind Points.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.89brp9KWRYdJlvgZ]{Ties That Bind} (SL5)

After you invoke a bond, you or the creature of that bond may recover a number of Hit Points or Mind Points equal to 【SL × the Strength of that bond】 , or a creature of your choice present in the scene may lose a number of Hit Points or Mind Points equal to 【SL × the Strength of that bond】 .

Heroic Skills
